ISSUE.TITLE: Product search by manufacturer and category name includes deleted entries
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60 > The SearchProductsAsync method is not taking into account deleted Categories and Manufactures, when AllowCustomersToSearchWithCategoryName and/or AllowCustomersToSearchWithManufacturerName are true. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/97641/by-design-or-bug Probably we should not only filter by `Deleted`, but also take into account all filters for categories (ACL and store mappings, `Published`, etc), like in [this method](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/4.60-bug-fixes/src/Libraries/Nop.Services/Catalog/CategoryService.cs#L240). Same for manufacturers. Let's think it out.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6790 Added constraints to search by manufacturer and category
